entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.4.4
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.4#fixed-in-202444

What's Changed

  • website/docs: update 2024.4 release notes with latest changes (cherry-pick #10231) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10244
  • security: fix CVE-2024-42490 (cherry-pick #11022) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11024

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.4.3...version/2024.4.4

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.6.4
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.6#fixed-in-202464

What's Changed

  • web/admin: fix selectable card colour in dark theme (cherry-pick #10794) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10795

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.6.3...version/2024.6.4

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.8.0
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.8

What's Changed

  • website/docs: 2024.8 release notes: reword group sync disable and fix typo (cherry-pick #11103) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11108
  • enterprise: fix incorrect comparison for latest validity date (cherry-pick #11109) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11110
  • ci: fix failing release attestation (cherry-pick #11107) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11120
  • web: fix dual-select with dynamic selection (cherry-pick #11133) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11134

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.8.0-rc2...version/2024.8.0

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.8.1
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.8#fixed-in-202481

What's Changed

  • providers/ldap: fix migration assuming search group is set (cherry-pick #11170) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11172
  • web/admin: fix error in Outpost creation form (cherry-pick #11173) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11175
  • core: fix change_user_type always requiring usernames (cherry-pick #11177) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11178
  • root: backport s3 storage changes (cherry-pick #11181) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11183
  • core: bump cryptography from 43.0.0 to 43.0.1 (cherry-pick #11185) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11202
  • website/docs: add note about terraform provider (cherry-pick #11206) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11208
  • web/admin: fix missing Sync object button SCIM Provider (cherry-pick #11211) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11213
  • providers/ldap: fix incorrect permission check for search access (cherry-pick #11217) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11218
  • web/admin: improve error handling (cherry-pick #11212) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11219
  • providers/ldap: rework search_group migration to work with read replicas (cherry-pick #11228) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11229
  • core: fix missing argument name escaping for property mapping (cherry-pick #11231) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11252
  • internal: fix go paginator not setting page correctly (cherry-pick #11253) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11255
  • web/users: show - if device was registered before we started saving the time (cherry-pick #11256) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11257

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.8.0...version/2024.8.1

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.8.2
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.8#fixed-on-202482

What's Changed

  • core: ensure proxy provider is correctly looked up (cherry-pick #11267) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11269
  • root: fix ensure `outpost_connection_discovery runs on worker startup (cherry-pick #11260) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11270
  • core: ensure all providers have correct priority (cherry-pick #11280) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11281
  • events: optimise marking events as seen (cherry-pick #11297) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11299
  • web/admin: fix notification property mapping forms (cherry-pick #11298) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11300
  • core: fix permission check for scoped impersonation (cherry-pick #11315) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11316
  • enterprise: show specific error if Install ID is invalid in license (cherry-pick #11317) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11319
  • sources/ldap: fix missing search attribute (cherry-pick #11125) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11340
  • enterprise: fix API mixin license validity check (cherry-pick #11331) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11342
  • providers/proxy: fix URL path getting lost when partial URL is given to rd= (cherry-pick #11354) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11355

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.8.1...version/2024.8.2
